page.title: 04TOR-NA-DEE HOSPITAL(Cont)
page.content: -nts whose families are not able to look after them. There is an extension,which was opened 7 years ago and is used for terminal diseases. Tor-na-dee has 74 patients and Roxburgh House has 21 patients. { {HOSPITAL STAFF} The hospital has over 100 nursing staff and a lot more cleaners and kitchen staff. Most of the staff are local. About five nurses and some catering staff live in the hospital. { {OUTINGS} In good weather patients are taken to the large garden behind the hospital.There are often concerts by local school children.About twice a month they are taken on country runs in a special ambulance or to the theatre where wheelchairs can go.
